articles.title: Monkeypox cases drop 21% globally, reversing month-long increase: WHO - CBC News
articles.description: The number of monkeypox cases reported globally dropped by 21 per cent in the last week, reversing a month-long trend of rising infections and a possible signal the outbreak in Europe may be starting to decline, according to a new report from the World Health…
articles.content: The number of monkeypox cases reported globally dropped by 21 per cent in the last week, reversing a month-long trend of rising infections and a possible signal the outbreak in Europe may be starting… [+4845 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: PlayStation 5 retail price is going up, Sony announces - Polygon
articles.description: The PS5 is getting more expensive. Sony announced Thursday it’s raising the retail price of the PlayStation 5 in the UK, Europe, Canada, Mexico, Japan, China, and Australia.
articles.content: Nearly two years into the life of the PlayStation 5, Sony is taking the unusual step of raising the price of its current-generation console. Sony Interactive Entertainment president and CEO Jim Ryan … [+2564 chars]
